description:
A traditional coin toss results in one of two options, Heads or Tails - 2 participants per toss. 

9 Tails Coin Toss allows up to 9 individuals to participate in a single coin toss. The available coins sets are:

Tails - US State Quarters,
Heads - US Presidential Dollars,
Euro - A collection of 20 different coins.

Each person taps one of the nine coins displayed on the screen; then, when the coin is tossed, only the selected coins are used and the winning coin is displayed from those. Re-flip the same set, re-select new coins, or generate a whole new set.

Want a traditional Heads or Tails coin toss? Select only one of the 9 coins displayed and toss the coin.

More than two people? If it's nine or less, 9 Tails Coin Toss can settle it in a single toss.
